snippet.title: HAWKEN - Official Trailer (Work in Progress)
snippet.description:
You are free to fight!
Join the Open Beta now: https://www.playhawken.com/#enlist/

Adhesive Games is developing Hawken, a new Mech Combat FPS.  
All clips in this video were captured from actual network game matches. The third person shots are from a spectator camera, gameplay is first person.  We expect to release a first person gameplay trailer soon.
